course_description: This course is designed for students who are currently registered with the Office of Disability Services. Options for physical education credit may include: attending physical therapy as prescribed by the student's physician, modified physical activity, attending PPF lectures, and labs and quizzes.
sections: Class Nbr: 6413, Section #: 1, Type: SUP, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: J. Ridgway, Status: Open
